agents

Class MetaAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.MetaAgent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogMetaAgent, Portal, SocketAgent, SystemAgent

    public abstract class MetaAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract MetaAgent class that implements a receiving and parsing behaviour for incoming message. In the terms of a message's lifetime within a MetaAgent; it should be added via addMessage(agents.Message) which adds it to the queue; where it is taken via the thread and parse(agents.Message)d. If parsing passes the message is execute(agents.Message)d.
    See Also:
    Message

    • Method Detail

      • threadRun

        protected void threadRun()
        Runs the logic that would usually happen within the running of the anonymous backing thread. This is to allow for overriding within child classes should the need arise for changing the running operation of the agent.

      • parse

        protected void parse(Message message)
        Parses a message, checking if the message is null and if the MetaAgent can receive it.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to parse.

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(Message message)
        Adds a message to this agent's queue. Use this over parse(agents.Message) to respect the MetaAgents queue.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to add to the queue.

      • execute

        protected abstract void execute(Message message)
        Executes the behaviour of this agent for the respective message.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to execute the behaviour of.

      • canReceive

        protected boolean canReceive(Message message)
        Whether or not the MetaAgent can receive and parse the message passed.
        Parameters:
        message - The message passed.
        Returns:
        Whether the message can be received and parsed.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the MetaAgent.
        Returns:
        The meta agent's name.

      • getParent

        public Portal getParent()
        Gets the parent agent of this agent.
        Returns:
        The parent agent.

      • end

        public void end()
        End the worker thread for this MetaAgent, setting Running to false. This will also interrupt the thread (due to blocking behaviour on the Message Queue) and cause a 'hard' death for the thread.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string interpretation of the MetaAgent.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The meta agent's name preceded by a string that shows that this is a meta agent.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Is the backing thread to this MetaAgent currently running?
        Returns:
        True if the current thread is running; false otherwise.

      • getQueue

        protected java.util.concurrent.ArrayBlockingQueue<Message> getQueue()
        Returns the Queue for this MetaAgent.
        Returns:
        The Meta-Agent's queue.
